title: Aatrox should only get 20% spellvamp without sweetspots
body:
I'm getting really tired of this champion failing his one skill check of landing sweet spots and still winning because his base damage and healing even without it is just ridiculous. 

His healing on his weak aoe needs to be completely trashed so that he can't muck up this hard and still come out on top.

replies.body: are you insane NO HELL NO

Agreed, tbh though simply removing it the self healing from his kit would be a better option imo. These new champions and reworks recently have far to many strengths and far to few weaknesses which ends up leading to them getting nerf after nerf

he is one of the few champions that has healing that isn't reduced by aoe
so his healing is insane compared to other aoe drain tanks
